nodes.text: The Firestorm was an Imperial-class Star Destroyer which became the flagship of Supreme Warlord Harrsk's fleet after the destruction of the Shockwave.

It was turned over to Admiral Daala who led the ship in an attack on High Admiral Treuten Teradoc. Later it was assigned to Gilad Pellaeon during the Assault on Yavin 4, and it was on the Firestorm that Daala turned over control of the Imperial Navy to Pellaeon.
